text: <a href="../1-Corinthians-13-1/" title="1 Corinthians 13:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, and have not charity, I am become *as* sounding brass, or a tinkling cymbal.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-2/" title="1 Corinthians 13:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And though I have *the gift of* prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, and have not charity, I am nothing.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-3/" title="1 Corinthians 13:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And though I bestow all my goods to feed *the poor*, and though I give my body to be burned, and have not charity, it profiteth me nothing.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-4/" title="1 Corinthians 13:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Charity suffereth long, *and* is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-5/" title="1 Corinthians 13:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil;
<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-6/" title="1 Corinthians 13:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth;
<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-7/" title="1 Corinthians 13:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-8/" title="1 Corinthians 13:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Charity never faileth: but whether *there be* prophecies, they shall fail; whether *there be* tongues, they shall cease; whether *there be* knowledge, it shall vanish away.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-9/" title="1 Corinthians 13:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 For we know in part, and we prophesy in part.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-10/" title="1 Corinthians 13:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 But when that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-11/" title="1 Corinthians 13:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 When I was a child, I spake as a child, I understood as a child, I thought as a child: but when I became a man, I put away childish things.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-12/" title="1 Corinthians 13:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-13-13/" title="1 Corinthians 13:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these *is* charity.
